title: Erdogan continues divisive rhetoric following victory
description: Erdogan's harsh rhetoric after his reelection may set Turkey on a turbulent course for the foreseeable future.

title: As Erdogan’s rule enters 3rd decade, leaders line up to congratulate him
description: After Recep Tayyip Erdogan’s reelection in Turkey, leaders across a geopolitical chasm, including President Biden and Russia’s Vladimir Putin, sent well wishes.

title: Uganda imposes death penalty for ‘aggravated homosexuality’
description: Uganda's Anti-Homosexuality Act punishes LGBTQ+ people with life imprisonment for gay sex and imposes the death penalty for "serial offenders."

title: Chinese police clash with protesters over plans to demolish mosque
description: The Chinese Communist Party's efforts to control religion appear to be spreading, with Hui Muslims in Yunnan trying to stop the demolition of part of a mosque.

title: Uruguay, hot and dry, adds saltwater to public drinking supply
description: The amount of sodium coming out of the tap is now more than twice the World Health Organization recommendation and 10 times normal levels.

title: Waters in Venice’s Grand Canal turn bright green, prompting investigation
description: Italian media said the occurrence was reminiscent of when an Argentine artist released colored pigment into the waterway in 1968 to raise ecological awareness.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Russia continues air raids; Ukraine proposes 50-year sanctions on Iran
description: Ukraine endured its 15th nightly air raid this month. The country’s military officials said Russian forces launched up to 40 missiles and 35 drones.

title: The American military veterans who’ve fallen in Ukraine
description: On Memorial Day, the loved ones of American veterans killed in Ukraine reckon with the meaning of service under one flag — and sacrifice under another.
